archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1297
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to be able to receive a notification in my letter box from Vodafone acknowledging faster speeds will soon be available at my address with the option to easily register my interest (subscribe) so that I can receive build updates and a personalised offer from Vodafone once Wireless is available.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
